alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 2:05PM EST until December 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Garrett and Extreme Western Allegany Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
